description: This table contains Face-to-Face orders for a home health episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The ID of a Face-to-Face verbal order.
